snippet: The Day: Every official seems to want to speechify on the state of his or her domain.
abstract: The Day: Every official seems to want to speechify on the state of his or her domain.
lead_paragraph: It's time to examine the state of the State of the State. And of the City. And of the Borough. And of an assortment of other entities that bring out the speech-making best and worst in many of our public figures.

headline.main: My Fellow Americans, New Yorkers, Brooklynites, Park Bench Users ...
